trans-unit.source: Provides a page adapter for the cHTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 提供页适配器为 cHTML 适配器集。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: Adapters are usually constructed automatically by ASP.NET and must have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 适配器通常通过 ASP.NET 自动构造，并且必须具有默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回适用于给定适配器的文本编写器。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: The text writer.
trans-unit.target: 文本编写器。

trans-unit.source: A text writer suitable for the given adapters.
trans-unit.target: 适用于给定适配器的文本编写器。

trans-unit.source: Called to determine the postback data collection.
trans-unit.target: 调用以确定回发数据集合。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"></xref> object that contains request information, such as HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"> </xref>对象，其中包含请求的信息，例如 HTTP 标头。

trans-unit.source: Source identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的源标识符。

trans-unit.source: Argument identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的自变量标识符。

trans-unit.source: Collection of postback data from the request object.
trans-unit.target: 来自请求对象的回发数据集合。

trans-unit.source: A modified version of the baseCollection parameter.
trans-unit.target: 修改的版本 baseCollection 参数。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates whether the device adapter set applies to the specified request.
trans-unit.target: 评估是否设备适配器集适用于指定的请求。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: |Class|Returns|Preferred rendering type|Check value of JavaScript property| |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the value of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> returns `true`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>.|The device capability of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A> returns `false`.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>|`true`|Checks whether the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A> is <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11> or <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>.|N/A|
trans-unit.target: |类 |返回 |首选呈现类型 |检查 JavaScript 属性值 | |-----------|-------------|------------------------------|----------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|检查是否<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>的值是<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>或者<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>。 |<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A>返回`true`。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter>|`true`|检查<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>是否<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32>或<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10>。 |设备功能的<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A>返回`false`。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter>|`true`|检查<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A>是否<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11>或<xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12>。 |N/A|</xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml12></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeWml11></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.ChtmlPageAdapter></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.JavaScript%2A></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeChtml10></xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities.PreferredRenderingTypeHtml32></xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.PreferredRenderingType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlPageAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The current request context.
trans-unit.target: 当前请求上下文。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the device adapter set applies to the specified request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果设备适配器设置将应用到指定的请求;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Renders a reference to a postback event appropriately for the target device.
trans-unit.target: 呈现到目标设备为适当的回发事件的引用。

trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.target: 指定的文本编写器。

trans-unit.source: The target device.

trans-unit.source: Optional event argument to pass.
trans-unit.target: 要传递的可选事件自变量。

trans-unit.source: Renders the header associated with postbacks.
trans-unit.target: 呈现与回发关联的标头。

trans-unit.source: For browsers that support script, this includes a script block to perform postback.
trans-unit.target: 对于支持脚本的浏览器，这包括执行回发的脚本块。
